ModMetaData.name: AdvancedWeapons A17
ModMetaData.author: ZModW
ModMetaData.description: ➤ AdvancedWeapons A17 1.0.3 - (Standalone) - ======================================================================== • AdvancedWeapons fügt 10 neue Waffen in dein Spiel. • Alle Waffen sind für das End Game von RimWorld designet. • Wir arbeiten an unserem Projekt und aktualisieren die Mod so schnell wie möglich. ======================================================================== For mor Information check our Website http://www.adf.ly/13564441/www.zmodw.jimdo.com/ ======================================================================== • AdvancedWeapons adds 10 new weapons into your Game. • All weapons are designed for the End Game of RimWorld. • We work on our Project and updating the Mod as soon as possible. ==================================== Thank You for Supporting us! ==================================== Programmer: ZeRo + W4D1m Artist: W4D1m + ZeRo ======================================================================== Have Fun/Viel Spass!
